views.createSql: CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS select * from user where valid_time_start <= (select max(x) from (select datetime('now') as x union select max(last_update) as x from updates)) and (select max(x) from (select datetime('now') as x union select max(last_update) as x from updates))  < valid_time_end and transaction_time_end = '9999-12-31 23:59:59.999999'

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS select * from user_device where valid_time_start <= (select max(x) from (select datetime('now') as x union select max(last_update) as x from updates)) and (select max(x) from (select datetime('now') as x union select max(last_update) as x from updates))  < valid_time_end and transaction_time_end = '9999-12-31 23:59:59.999999'

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS select unit._id as unit__id, unit.version as unit_version, unit.valid_time_start as unit_valid_time_start, unit.valid_time_end as unit_valid_time_end, unit.transaction_time_start as unit_transaction_time_start, unit.transaction_time_end as unit_transaction_time_end, unit.initiates as unit_initiates, unit.name as unit_name, unit.abbreviation as unit_abbreviation, scaled_unit._id as scaled_unit__id, scaled_unit.version as scaled_unit_version, scaled_unit.valid_time_start as scaled_unit_valid_time_start, scaled_unit.valid_time_end as scaled_unit_valid_time_end, scaled_unit.transaction_time_start as scaled_unit_transaction_time_start, scaled_unit.transaction_time_end as scaled_unit_transaction_time_end, scaled_unit.initiates as scaled_unit_initiates, scaled_unit.scale as scaled_unit_scale, scaled_unit.unit as scaled_unit_unit, fooditem.of_type as of_type, fooditem.stored_in as stored_in, count(*) as amount from current_fooditem fooditem inner join scaled_unit scaled_unit on scaled_unit._id = fooditem.unit and scaled_unit.valid_time_start <= (select max(x) from (select datetime('now') as x union select max(last_update) as x from updates)) and (select max(x) from (select datetime('now') as x union select max(last_update) as x from updates))  < scaled_unit.valid_time_end and scaled_unit.transaction_time_end = '9999-12-31 23:59:59.999999' inner join unit unit on unit._id = scaled_unit.unit and unit.valid_time_start <= (select max(x) from (select datetime('now') as x union select max(last_update) as x from updates)) and (select max(x) from (select datetime('now') as x union select max(last_update) as x from updates))  < unit.valid_time_end and unit.transaction_time_end = '9999-12-31 23:59:59.999999' group by fooditem.of_type, fooditem.unit union all select unit._id as unit__id, unit.version as unit_version, unit.valid_time_start as unit_valid_time_start, unit.valid_time_end as unit_valid_time_end, unit.transaction_time_start as unit_transaction_time_start, unit.transaction_time_end as unit_transaction_time_end, unit.initiates as unit_initiates, unit.name as unit_name, unit.abbreviation as unit_abbreviation, scaled_unit._id as scaled_unit__id, scaled_unit.version as scaled_unit_version, scaled_unit.valid_time_start as scaled_unit_valid_time_start, scaled_unit.valid_time_end as scaled_unit_valid_time_end, scaled_unit.transaction_time_start as scaled_unit_transaction_time_start, scaled_unit.transaction_time_end as scaled_unit_transaction_time_end, scaled_unit.initiates as scaled_unit_initiates, scaled_unit.scale as scaled_unit_scale, scaled_unit.unit as scaled_unit_unit, food._id as of_type, food.location as stored_in, 0 as amount from current_food food inner join scaled_unit scaled_unit on scaled_unit._id = food.store_unit and scaled_unit.valid_time_start <= (select max(x) from (select datetime('now') as x union select max(last_update) as x from updates)) and (select max(x) from (select datetime('now') as x union select max(last_update) as x from updates))  < scaled_unit.valid_time_end and scaled_unit.transaction_time_end = '9999-12-31 23:59:59.999999' inner join unit unit on unit._id = scaled_unit.unit and unit.valid_time_start <= (select max(x) from (select datetime('now') as x union select max(last_update) as x from updates)) and (select max(x) from (select datetime('now') as x union select max(last_update) as x from updates))  < unit.valid_time_end and unit.transaction_time_end = '9999-12-31 23:59:59.999999' where food._id not in (select distinct of_type from current_fooditem fooditem)

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS select source._id as source_id, target._id as target_id, cast(source.scale as numeric) / cast(target.scale as numeric) as factor from current_scaled_unit source join current_scaled_unit target on source.unit = target.unit

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS select recipe._id as recipe_id, recipe_ingredient.ingredient as ingredient, recipe_ingredient.amount as required_amount, recipe_ingredient.unit as required_unit, current_scaled_amount.amount as present_amount, current_scaled_amount.scaled_unit__id as present_unit, cast(current_scaled_amount.amount as numeric) * coalesce((select factor from current_scaled_unit_conversion where source_id = current_scaled_amount.scaled_unit__id and target_id = recipe_ingredient.unit), 0) as present_amount_scaled from current_recipe recipe join current_recipe_ingredient recipe_ingredient on recipe_ingredient.recipe = recipe._id join current_scaled_amount current_scaled_amount on current_scaled_amount.of_type = recipe_ingredient.ingredient

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS select recipe_id, ingredient, required_amount, min(cast(1 as numeric), max(present_amount)) as present_for_necessary, case when max(present_amount_scaled) >= required_amount then 1 else 0 end present_for_sufficient from current_scaled_ingredient_amount_and_stock where required_amount > 0 group by recipe_id, ingredient, required_amount, required_unit
